title: Attention-Association Model and Inhibitory Conditioning Stimulus Design: Predictive Learning-Based Project

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational psychology theories and learning conditioning concepts
context.additional_context: Environment enabling experimental design and data analysis using digital tools.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the core principles of the attention-association model
Learners can experimentally measure and analyze changes in the expression of inhibitory conditioned stimuli
Learners can complete projects evaluating association effects with new CS (conditioned stimuli) using Predictive Learning Design
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
